en: John is clever.
zh: 约翰挺聪明的。

en: John likes to trade stamps with his friends.
zh: 约翰喜欢和朋友交换邮票。

en: John talked his friends into helping the poor family.
zh: 约翰说服了朋友们去帮助那户穷人家。

en: John did a brave thing.
zh: 约翰做了一件勇敢的事。

en: John has hardly ever gone to bed before midnight.
zh: 约翰几乎没在半夜前睡过觉。

en: John is in the habit of staying up until midnight.
zh: 约翰习惯熬夜到半夜。

en: John moved forward to the gate.
zh: 约翰朝大门走去。

en: Will John come to see us tomorrow?
zh: 约翰明天会来看我们吗？

en: John tried not to wake the sleeping baby.
zh: 约翰尽量不吵醒正在睡觉的宝宝。

en: John built a bookcase.
zh: 约翰做了一个书架。

en: John was standing alone in the room with his arms folded.
zh: 约翰独自站在房间里，抱着胳膊。

en: John ran into the room.
zh: 约翰跑进了房间。

en: John is better loved than his father.
zh: 约翰比他父亲更招人喜欢。

en: John went to America by air.
zh: 约翰坐飞机去了美国。

en: John is very proud of his new house.
zh: 约翰对他新买的房子非常自豪。

en: John goes to his office on foot.
zh: 约翰走路去办公室。

en: His shrewdness marks John for success.
zh: 约翰很精明，注定会成功。

en: John inherited a large fortune.
zh: 约翰继承了一大笔遗产。

en: John is admitted to be a fool.
zh: 大家都公认约翰是个傻瓜。

en: John was beating the drums loudly.
zh: 约翰正在大声敲鼓。

en: John works hard.
zh: 约翰干活很努力。

en: John has a car made in Japan.
zh: 约翰有一辆日本产的车。

en: John is the taller of the two boys.
zh: 约翰是这两个男孩里个子更高的那个。

en: John is looking for a book on Japanese history.
zh: 约翰在找一本关于日本历史的书。

en: John got suddenly ill, but in the case of Bill, he simply forgot about the meeting.
zh: 约翰突然病了，而比尔只是忘了开会。

en: John has to do without a stereo for the time being.
zh: 约翰暂时只能不用音响了。

en: John is not so much a genius as a hard worker.
zh: 与其说约翰是天才，不如说他是个很刻苦的人。

en: John has been moody since this morning.
zh: 约翰从今天早上起就情绪低落。

en: John stretched out on the couch.
zh: 约翰在沙发上伸展开了身体。

en: John listened carefully.
zh: 约翰听得很认真。

en: John is careless. He makes many mistakes.
zh: 约翰很粗心，经常犯错。

en: John is very careless about his clothes.
zh: 约翰对穿衣服很不讲究。

en: John helped himself to several pieces of pie without asking.
zh: 约翰没打招呼就自己拿了几块派。

en: John put across a big housing project.
zh: 约翰促成了一个大型住房项目。

en: John hit the jackpot. His efforts paid off beyond his wildest dreams.
zh: 约翰撞大运了，他的努力得到了意想不到的回报。

en: John grew up to be a great artist.
zh: 约翰长大后成了一位伟大的艺术家。

en: John is a far better singer than the others.
zh: 约翰唱歌比其他人好得多。

en: John is too fat to run fast.
zh: 约翰太胖了，跑不快。

en: John hung his hopes on his son.
zh: 约翰把希望寄托在儿子身上。

en: John came running into the room.
zh: 约翰跑着进了房间。

en: John took a walk along the river.
zh: 约翰在河边散步。

en: John had a bad cold last week.
zh: 约翰上周得了重感冒。

en: John casts the blame on others.
zh: 约翰把责任推给别人。

en: John seems very honest by nature.
zh: 约翰天生看起来就很诚实。

en: John has a natural bent for tennis.
zh: 约翰有打网球的天赋。

en: John is cheerful by nature.
zh: 约翰天生性格开朗。

en: John is good at mathematics.
zh: 约翰数学很好。

en: John belongs to the swimming club.
zh: 约翰是游泳俱乐部的成员。

en: John represented his class in the swimming match.
zh: 约翰代表班级参加了游泳比赛。

en: John hopes to be independent of his parents.
zh: 约翰希望能独立，不再依赖父母。

en: John wanted to be completely independent of his parents.
zh: 约翰想完全自立，不再依赖父母。

en: John was praised for his good homework.
zh: 约翰因为作业写得好受到了表扬。

en: John is a strong believer in fresh air.
zh: 约翰非常崇尚呼吸新鲜空气。

en: John lives above his means.
zh: 约翰花钱大手大脚，总是入不敷出。

en: John ran to the station so as to catch the last train.
zh: 约翰为了赶上最后一班车，是一路跑去车站的。

en: John started the car.
zh: 约翰发动了车子。

en: John always breaks the ice in class.
zh: 约翰在班里总是带头打破冷场。

en: I think John is quite selfish, and a little bit vain. He isn't easy to get on with.
zh: 我觉得约翰挺自私的，还有点虚荣，不太好相处。

en: John came to terms with his problem, which means he has accepted it.
zh: 约翰已经面对现实了，也就是说，他已经接受了这件事。

en: John makes fun of his dog.
zh: 约翰老是逗他的狗玩。

en: John tends to get angry when he doesn't have his own way.
zh: 只要事情没按约翰的意思来，他就容易生气。

en: John has confidence in his ability.
zh: 约翰对自己的能力很有信心。

en: John worked his company with success.
zh: 约翰把公司经营得很成功。

en: John can't keep his family.
zh: 约翰养不起家。

en: John began trade personally.
zh: 约翰开始亲自做生意了。

en: John doesn't know what to do next.
zh: 约翰不知道下一步该怎么办。

en: On hearing himself praised, John was deeply embarrassed.
zh: 约翰一听到有人夸他，就显得特别不好意思。

en: John sometime goes overboard in drinking.
zh: 约翰有时候喝酒没分寸。

en: John passed the examination.
zh: 约翰考试通过了。

en: John made believe that he passed the exam.
zh: 约翰假装他考试合格了。

en: John is my junior by two years.
zh: 约翰比我小两岁。

en: John hit me on the head.
zh: 约翰打了一下我的头。

en: John is as old as my brother.
zh: 约翰和我哥哥一样大。

en: John is my younger brother.
zh: 约翰是我弟弟。

en: John is my best friend.
zh: 约翰是我最好的朋友。

en: John is a good friend of mine.
zh: 约翰是我的一个好朋友。

en: John ignored my advice.
zh: 约翰没听我的建议。

en: John is my nephew.
zh: 约翰是我侄子。

en: John is not my brother, but my cousin.
zh: 约翰不是我亲兄弟，而是我的表兄弟。

en: John called me names.
zh: 约翰骂了我。

en: John is as old as I.
zh: 约翰跟我一样大。

en: John said he'd like to marry me, and I'm as happy as can be.
zh: 约翰说他想娶我，我简直开心得不得了。

en: John used to stand by me whenever I was in trouble.
zh: 以前每当我遇到麻烦，约翰总会站在我这边。

en: John is the cleverest of us all.
zh: 约翰是我们当中最聪明的。

en: After John became manager, he told me he would never have expected to reach such a high position.
zh: 约翰当上经理后跟我说，他压根儿没想过能爬到这么高的位置。

en: John has been collecting stamps since he was a child.
zh: 约翰从小就开始集邮了。

en: John did not know how to explain to his wife that he had quit his job.
zh: 约翰不知道该怎么跟他老婆解释他辞职的事。

en: John stayed in bed all day instead of going to work.
zh: 约翰没去上班，在床上躺了一整天。

en: John was tired from working overtime.
zh: 约翰因为加班累坏了。

en: John was absent from school yesterday.
zh: 约翰昨天没去上学。

en: John is not the man that he was three years ago.
zh: 约翰和三年前相比简直判若两人。

en: John came to Japan yesterday.
zh: 约翰昨天来日本了。

en: John left for France yesterday.
zh: 约翰昨天动身去法国了。

en: John skied up the slope.
zh: 约翰滑雪上了坡。

en: John is a good husband to his wife.
zh: 约翰对他老婆很好，是个称职的丈夫。

en: John had a violent quarrel with his wife.
zh: 约翰跟他老婆大吵了一架。

en: John has put on a lot of weight recently.
zh: 约翰最近胖了好多。

en: John isn't well enough to go to school today.
zh: 约翰今天身体不舒服，没法去学校。

en: John sat looking out of the window.
zh: 约翰坐着望向窗外。

en: John cannot be living in London now.
zh: 约翰现在不可能住在伦敦。

en: What is John doing now?
zh: 约翰现在在干嘛？

en: John is at his peak now.
zh: 约翰现在正处于巅峰期。

en: John should be here any minute now.
zh: 约翰随时都会到。

en: I'd like to speak to John.
zh: 我想找下约翰。

en: Said John, and he was right.
zh: 约翰是这么说的，而且他说得没错。

en: John stayed at home as he was told.
zh: 约翰听话待在家里了。

en: John finished the work at the expense of his health.
zh: 约翰为了完成工作把身体都搞垮了。

en: John is brave in appearance, but is in reality a coward.
zh: 约翰看着挺勇敢，其实是个胆小鬼。

en: John writes a letter to his parents once a month.
zh: 约翰每个月给父母写一封信。

en: John passed among the crowd.
zh: 约翰穿过了人群。

en: John is envious of your new car.
zh: 约翰挺羡慕你那辆新车的。

en: These days John drinks too much.
zh: 约翰这阵子酒喝得太多了。

en: John is easy to please.
zh: 约翰这人挺好说话的。

en: John is head and shoulders above any of his classmates in French.
zh: 约翰的法语比班上任何人都好出一大截。

en: John did even better than was expected.
zh: 约翰表现得比预想的还要好。

en: John kept his head above water.
zh: 约翰勉强维持生计。

en: John covers the Kanto area and Taro covers the Kansai area.
zh: 约翰负责关东地区，太郎负责关西地区。

en: John is likely to make a mistake.
zh: 约翰很可能会犯错。

en: John is having a good time.
zh: 约翰玩得很开心。

en: John studied hard at school, while at home he helped his mother with her work.
zh: 约翰在学校学习很努力，在家里还会帮他妈妈干活。

en: John turned his back on the company and started on his own.
zh: 约翰离开公司开始自己创业了。

en: John puts his career before his family.
zh: 约翰把事业看得比家庭更重要。

en: John wanted to be completely independent of his family.
zh: 约翰想完全脱离家庭自立。

en: John is walking in the direction of the station.
zh: 约翰正朝着车站的方向走。

en: John knows English history from A to Z.
zh: 约翰对英国历史了如指掌。

en: Has John returned to America for good?
zh: 约翰是打算回美国长住了吗？

en: John is above telling a lie.
zh: 约翰是不屑于撒谎的。

en: John had to get along on a shoestring.
zh: 约翰不得不靠很少的钱紧巴巴地过日子。

en: John is waiting for Lucy, but the train has already left.
zh: 约翰在等露西，但火车已经开了。

en: Has John decided on a career yet?
zh: 约翰决定好以后干什么了吗？

en: John is going to tell Lucy about the origin of rugby.
zh: 约翰打算跟露西讲讲橄榄球的起源。

en: John is much taller than Mary.
zh: 约翰比玛丽高得多。

en: John asked Mary whether she would like to go shopping.
zh: 约翰问玛丽想不想去逛街。

en: John gave Mary some money.
zh: 约翰给了玛丽一些钱。

en: John asked Mary whether she would like to go shopping in the afternoon.
zh: 约翰问玛丽下午想不想去逛街。

en: John accompanied Mary to the concert.
zh: 约翰陪玛丽去了音乐会。

en: John has not come yet, but when he does, I will call you.
zh: 约翰还没到，等他到了我给你打电话。

en: First John put on his coat, and then he picked up his hat.
zh: 约翰先穿上外套，然后拿起了帽子。

en: John is mad about pop music.
zh: 约翰对流行音乐简直着了迷。

en: John took a key out of his pocket.
zh: 约翰从兜里掏出了一把钥匙。

en: John acts like Helen's guardian.
zh: 约翰表现得就像海伦的监护人一样。

en: John made Beth his wife.
zh: 约翰娶了贝丝。

en: John can really talk a blue streak about Peru.
zh: 约翰讲起秘鲁来简直滔滔不绝。

en: John comes from Florida and his wife from California.
zh: 约翰来自佛罗里达，他老婆来自加利福尼亚。

en: John can't speak French well.
zh: 约翰法语说得不太好。

en: John is waiting for Mary on the platform.
zh: 约翰在站台上等玛丽。

en: John drank many bottles of wine.
zh: 约翰喝了好多瓶酒。

en: John is cleverer than Bill.
zh: 约翰比比尔聪明。

en: John took advantage of Bill's weakness.
zh: 约翰利用了比尔的弱点。

en: John is not as old as Bill; he is much younger.
zh: 约翰没有比尔大，他年轻得多。

en: John was in such a hurry that he had no time for talking.
zh: 约翰急得都没时间说话了。

en: John is familiar with the business.
zh: 约翰对这一行挺熟的。

en: John picked a quarrel with college kids near him at the bar.
zh: 约翰在酒吧跟旁边的大学生吵了起来。

en: John lives in New York.
zh: 约翰住在纽约。

en: John caught a tiger and shot two lions.
zh: 约翰抓到了一只老虎，还打死了两头狮子。

en: Jon is far more attractive than Tom.
zh: 约翰比汤姆帅多了。

en: John is wrestling with Tom.
zh: 约翰正跟汤姆摔跤呢。

en: John is very tall. He stands about seven feet.
zh: 约翰特别高，大概有七英尺。

en: John spoke in such a loud voice that I could hear him upstairs.
zh: 约翰说话声音大得我在楼上都能听到。

en: Where does John live?
zh: 约翰住哪儿？

en: I wonder why John is always late for school.
zh: 我纳闷约翰上学怎么老是迟到。

en: John sent me a letter written in German.
zh: 约翰给我寄了一封德语写的信。

en: John kept the door open.
zh: 约翰一直让门开着。

en: John burst into laughter when he was watching TV.
zh: 约翰看电视的时候突然哈哈大笑。

en: When John goes on a date, he's known to be a big spender.
zh: 约翰约会的时候花钱大手大脚是出了名的。

en: John played cat and mouse with Dick.
zh: 约翰跟迪克玩起了猫捉老鼠的游戏。

en: John is good at chess.
zh: 约翰下棋挺厉害的。

en: John likes chess.
zh: 约翰喜欢下棋。

en: Probably John will pass the examination.
zh: 约翰这次考试估计能过。

en: John can't do it, nor can I, nor can you.
zh: 约翰做不到，我也做不到，你也做不到。

en: John likes lying at ease on the sofa.
zh: 约翰喜欢舒舒服服地躺在沙发上。

en: John tried in vain to solve the problem.
zh: 约翰想尽办法也没能解决那个问题。

en: John ordered the book from the publisher in the United States.
zh: 约翰从美国的出版社订了那本书。

en: She said that John must be very glad to hear the news.
zh: 她说约翰听到这消息肯定特别高兴。

en: John will not answer the question.
zh: 约翰不会回答那个问题的。

en: I don't think John is suited for the job.
zh: 我觉得约翰不适合这份工作。

en: John stared at the picture.
zh: 约翰盯着那张画看。

en: John laid claim to the painting.
zh: 约翰声称那幅画是他的。

en: John can't bear the noise.
zh: 约翰受不了那种噪音。

en: John is sure to succeed his father in the company.
zh: 约翰肯定会接他父亲在公司的班。

en: John felt the presence of a ghost in the dark room.
zh: 约翰觉得黑屋子里有鬼。

en: John had put his sweater on inside out.
zh: 约翰把毛衣穿反了。

en: John has already come to the station.
zh: 约翰已经到车站了。

en: John sang "Imagine" on the stage.
zh: 约翰在台上唱了《Imagine》。

en: What did John sing on the stage?
zh: 约翰在台上唱了什么？

en: John drinks Scotch and Mary bourbon.
zh: 约翰喝苏格兰威士忌，玛丽喝波本。

en: John sits by Jack.
zh: 约翰坐在杰克旁边。

en: John was married to Jane.
zh: 约翰跟简结婚了。

en: John went away without so much as saying good-by.
zh: 约翰连句再见都没说就走了。

en: John is interested in golf.
zh: 约翰对高尔夫挺感兴趣的。

en: John has the complete collection of Sam's music.
zh: 约翰有山姆所有的音乐作品。

en: John has no friends here.
zh: 约翰在这儿没朋友。

en: John is free from worry these days.
zh: 约翰最近没什么烦心事。

en: John drinks too much these days. We have to stop him from drinking any more.
zh: 约翰最近喝得太多了，我们得拦着点，别让他再喝了。

en: John is sure to win the game.
zh: 约翰肯定能赢这场比赛。

en: John can not play the guitar.
zh: 约翰不会弹吉他。

en: John played guitar and his friends sang.
zh: 约翰弹吉他，他朋友们唱歌。

en: John can't play the guitar.
zh: 约翰不会弹吉他。

en: John talked with his customer on the phone.
zh: 约翰在电话里跟客户谈事呢。

en: John is professor of French literature at Oxford and his wife is French.
zh: 约翰是牛津大学的法国文学教授，他妻子是法国人。

en: John is as lean as a wolf.
zh: 约翰瘦得像匹狼。

en: John always tried to live up to the example of Lincoln.
zh: 约翰总是努力向林肯看齐。

en: John had awoken much earlier than usual.
zh: 约翰醒得比平时早多了。

en: John was making mistakes all the time.
zh: 约翰那会儿老是犯错。

en: John will make a good husband and father.
zh: 约翰以后肯定是个好丈夫、好父亲。

en: John is a good student.
zh: 约翰是个好学生。

en: John was too surprised to say anything.
zh: 约翰惊讶得一句话都说不出来。

en: John is an American boy.
zh: 约翰是个美国男孩。

en: John is not a man to betray you.
zh: 约翰不是那种会出卖你的人。

en: John had been lazy before he met you.
zh: 约翰在遇到你之前一直挺懒的。

en: John is eighty years old but still fit.
zh: 约翰八十岁了，但身体还挺硬朗。

en: John will be here in five minutes.
zh: 约翰五分钟后就到。

en: John is not the man he was three years ago.
zh: 约翰已经不是三年前的他了。

en: John employs 200 workers.
zh: 约翰雇了200个工人。

en: I have known John since 1976.
zh: 我从1976年就认识约翰了。

en: John must work hard to catch up with his classmates.
zh: 约翰得努力学习才能赶上同学。

en: John called for the waiter in a loud voice.
zh: 约翰大声叫服务员过来。

en: John investigated the accident thoroughly.
zh: 约翰彻底调查了那起事故。

en: John is senior to me by two years.
zh: 约翰比我大两岁。

en: John became a policeman.
zh: 约翰当了警察。

en: John stood still with his eyes fixed on something strange.
zh: 约翰一动不动地站着，盯着个奇怪的东西看。

en: John is senior to Robert.
zh: 约翰比罗伯特大。

en: John claimed that the dishonest salesman had tricked him into buying a useless piece of machinery.
zh: 约翰说是那个不诚实的推销员骗他买了个没用的机器。

en: John is seeing to the arrangements for the meeting.
zh: 约翰正在安排会议的事儿。

en: John is the taller of the two, and the tallest of them all.
zh: 约翰是两人中较高的那个，也是所有人里最高的。

en: John, the tallest boy in our class, is nicknamed "Mr High".
zh: 约翰是我们班最高的，外号叫“高个子”。

en: John, who is the youngest in a family of seven, is the apple of his parents' eyes.
zh: 约翰家有七个孩子，他是最小的，也是父母的掌上明珠。

en: When John's neighbor saw John selling drugs, she blew the whistle on him.
zh: 约翰的邻居看见他在卖毒品，就把他举报了。

en: John's parents seemed relieved to hear that his plane was on time.
zh: 约翰的父母听说飞机准点到，好像松了口气。

en: John's parents seemed relieved to hear that he was safe.
zh: 约翰的父母听说他平安无事，好像松了口气。

en: John is the taller of the two.
zh: 约翰是两个人里较高的那个。

en: John's mother looks so young that she is often mistaken for his elder sister.
zh: 约翰的妈妈看起来特别年轻，常被误认为是他的姐姐。

en: John's father has some knowledge of French.
zh: 约翰的爸爸懂点法语。

en: John's business has turned out to be a complete failure.
zh: 约翰的生意最后彻底失败了。

en: According to John, the bank closes at 3 p.m.
zh: 听约翰说，银行下午三点关门。

en: John's face was drawn.
zh: 约翰一脸憔悴。

en: Such an honest man as John cannot have told a lie.
zh: 像约翰这么诚实的人，不可能撒谎。

en: John was mentioned in the paper.
zh: 报纸上提到约翰了。

en: Do you know John's father died of a heart attack?
zh: 你知道约翰的父亲死于心脏病吗？

en: I am going to have John repair my watch.
zh: 我打算让约翰帮我修表。

en: John's grandmother passed away after a long illness.
zh: 约翰的奶奶久病去世了。

en: Did you hear what happened to John?
zh: 你听说约翰出什么事了吗？

en: John has two sons.
zh: 约翰有两个儿子。

en: There is enough money for John to buy a car.
zh: 钱够约翰买辆车了。

en: John shall have a holiday one of these days.
zh: 约翰这几天会放假的。

en: Please remind me to call John at nine.
zh: 记得提醒我九点给约翰打电话。

en: The girl talking with John is Susan.
zh: 跟约翰聊天的那个女孩是苏珊。

en: The student who is talking with John is from Canada.
zh: 正在跟约翰说话的那个学生是加拿大人。

en: In interviewing John for the job, we must take into account that he has very bad eyesight.
zh: 面试约翰的时候，我们得考虑到他视力很差。

en: John and I alternated in driving.
zh: 约翰和我轮流开车。

en: John and I are old friends.
zh: 我和约翰是老朋友了。

en: Talking of John, what has become of his sister?
zh: 说到约翰，他妹妹最近怎么样了？

en: John and Mary broke up last week.
zh: 约翰和玛丽上周分手了。

en: John and Mary differed in opinion as to that important matter.
zh: 约翰和玛丽在那件大事上的意见有分歧。

en: John and Mary loved each other.
zh: 约翰和玛丽曾深爱着对方。

en: John and Mary always walk hand in hand.
zh: 约翰和玛丽总是手牵着手走路。

en: John and Mary have known each other since 1976.
zh: 约翰和玛丽从1976年起就认识了。

en: John and Beth are of an age.
zh: 约翰和贝丝同岁。

en: John and I have patched up our troubles.
zh: 我和约翰已经和好了。

en: No one came to the party except John and Dick.
zh: 除了约翰和迪克，没别的人去派对。

en: There is a rumor that John and Sue will get married.
zh: 有传言说约翰和苏要结婚了。

en: John and Cathy have different tastes and different characters. Trying to get them together is like putting a square peg in a round hole.
zh: 约翰和凯茜口味不同，性格也不同，硬要把他俩凑一块儿根本不合适。

en: Is John available now?
zh: 约翰现在有空吗？

en: John and Ann like each other.
zh: 约翰和安互相喜欢。

en: John Tel is expected to delay the release of its chip set until August.
zh: John Tel 预计会推迟到八月才发布其芯片组。

en: John alone went there.
zh: 只有约翰一个人去了那儿。

en: May I introduce you to Dr. Johnson?
zh: 我可以给您介绍一下约翰逊博士吗？

en: May I present Mr Johnson to you?
zh: 我可以向您介绍一下约翰逊先生吗？

en: Mr Johnson is a lawyer. He will be having three clients this afternoon.
zh: 约翰逊先生是个律师，他今天下午要见三个客户。

en: Mr Johnson suddenly changed his mind and signed the contract.
zh: 约翰逊先生突然改变主意签了合同。

en: Mr Johnson is self-employed and is in the business of repairing furniture.
zh: 约翰逊先生是自由职业，做家具修理生意。

en: Mr Johnson's was a large room.
zh: 约翰逊先生的房间很大。

en: Mr Johnson insists on his theory.
zh: 约翰逊先生坚持他的理论。

en: Mr Johnson is not a scholar but a poet.
zh: 约翰逊先生不是学者，而是一个诗人。

en: Mr Johnson ran fastest of the three.
zh: 约翰逊先生是三个人里跑得最快的。

en: Mr Johnson's house is next to my house.
zh: 约翰逊先生家就在我家隔壁。

en: The Johnsons are very sociable people, who enjoy hosting parties often.
zh: 约翰逊一家人特别好客，经常办派对。

en: The Johnsons love to have parties.
zh: 约翰逊一家很喜欢办聚会。

en: It is not that Johnson's claim is groundless, but that it is misleading.
zh: 约翰逊的主张并非毫无根据，只是具有误导性。

en: It is clearly shown in Johnson's investigation that passive smoking is very harmful.
zh: 约翰逊的调查清楚地显示，吸二手烟危害很大。

en: Mr Johnson was concerned about the amount of money that was being lost because of careless management.
zh: 约翰逊先生很担心因为管理不善而造成的资金损失。

en: With the money Mr Johnson had saved, he would be able to live high on the hog when he retired.
zh: 靠着攒下的钱，约翰逊先生退休后可以过上很阔绰的生活。

en: Mr Johnson is, as it were, a walking dictionary.
zh: 约翰逊先生简直就是一本活字典。

en: Mr Johnson is a rich man.
zh: 约翰逊先生是个有钱人。

en: Is Mr Johnson in?
zh: 约翰逊先生在吗？

en: There's a rumor Johnson is going to be traded.
zh: 有传言说约翰逊要被交易了。

en: Lyndon Johnson took over presidency when John Kennedy was assassinated.
zh: 肯尼迪遇刺后，林登·约翰逊接任了总统。

en: Let's go as soon as John comes.
zh: 约翰一到我们就走。

en: I hope for John to come.
zh: 我希望约翰能来。

en: I will leave when John comes.
zh: 约翰来了我就走。

en: When John came back, he looked pale as if he had seen a ghost.
zh: 约翰回来时脸色惨白，就像见了鬼一样。

en: John answered for his sister.
zh: 约翰替他妹妹作了回答。

en: John broke the window.
zh: 约翰把窗户打破了。

en: I can't imagine John coming on time.
zh: 我没法想象约翰能准时到。

en: Either John or I am to blame.
zh: 不是约翰的错，就是我的错。

en: John hates me and it shows.
zh: 约翰讨厌我，这谁都看出来了。

en: When John retired, his son took over his business.
zh: 约翰退休后，他儿子接手了他的生意。

en: It was only yesterday that John told me about his plan to go to Europe.
zh: 直到昨天，约翰才跟我说了他要去欧洲的计划。

en: John came and moved some of the boxes.
zh: 约翰过来搬走了一些箱子。

en: John put his foot on the brake and we stopped suddenly.
zh: 约翰踩了脚刹车，我们猛地停了下来。

en: I heard John speak to Mr Brown.
zh: 我听见约翰在跟布朗先生说话。

en: I can't understand why John turned down a job as good as that.
zh: 我真搞不懂约翰为什么要拒绝那么好的工作。

en: No one seems to have any idea where John is.
zh: 好像谁都不知道约翰去哪儿了。

en: John has been painting the door.
zh: 约翰一直在给门刷漆。

en: It took John about two weeks to get over his illness.
zh: 约翰病了大概两周才好。

en: It took John only one day to make friends with his classmates at the school.
zh: 约翰只用了一天就和学校同学打成一片了。

en: It was in 1980 that John was shot at this spot.
zh: 约翰就是在1980年在这个地方被枪击的。

en: John broke the window yesterday.
zh: 约翰昨天把窗户打破了。

en: If John had of come, I needn't have.
zh: 要是约翰来了，我就没必要了。

en: I'd like to speak to John Warner.
zh: 我想找约翰·华纳通话。

en: John Lennon was born in 1940.
zh: 约翰·列侬是1940年出生的。

en: It was in 1980 that John Lennon was shot at this spot.
zh: 约翰·列侬就是在1980年在这个地方被枪杀的。

en: John Wayne was one of the most popular movie stars of this century.
zh: 约翰·韦恩是本世纪最红的影星之一。

en: I swear, John. As of today, I quit smoking.
zh: 我发誓，约翰，从今天起我戒烟了。

en: I'll call on you, John.
zh: 约翰，我会去拜访你的。

en: Enjoy yourself at the party, John.
zh: 约翰，派对上玩得开心点啊。

en: Chopin sits at the piano and begins to play.
zh: 肖邦坐到钢琴前开始弹奏。

en: He goes and sits outside the class but he can't stop laughing.
zh: 他去教室外面坐着，可还是笑个不停。

en: Little Johnny farts in the classroom.
zh: 小约翰尼在教室里放了个屁。

en: Little Johnny what are you doing sitting here laughing?
zh: 小约翰尼，你坐在这儿笑什么呢？

en: Johnny got leave to go home.
zh: 约翰尼获准回家了。

en: Johnny moved to Spain just a few months ago, so he isn't used to speaking Spanish as yet.
zh: 约翰尼几个月前才搬到西班牙，所以现在还不习惯说西班牙语。

en: Johnny proposed to Alice and she accepted.
zh: 约翰尼向爱丽丝求婚，她答应了。

en: Johnny kept planting apple seeds for 46 years.
zh: 约翰尼坚持种苹果种子种了46年。

en: Jody looks as if she had seen a ghost.
zh: 乔迪看起来跟见了鬼似的。

en: Is there a bus that goes to the mall?
zh: 有去购物中心的公交车吗？

en: Could you put it in a shopping bag for me?
zh: 能帮我拿个购物袋装一下吗？

en: The shopping center is a mile further down the road.
zh: 购物中心就在这条路再往前一英里的地方。

en: Where's the shopping center?
zh: 购物中心在哪儿？

en: At the car wash next to the shopping mall.
zh: 就在购物中心旁边的那个洗车场。

en: Some people have very fast serves.
zh: 有些人的发球特别快。

en: I have to blow my nose all the time.
zh: 我得一直擤鼻涕。

en: I go skiing very often.
zh: 我经常去滑雪。

en: The shock deprived her of speech.
zh: 惊吓过度让她说不出话来了。

en: The shock robbed her of speech for a moment.
zh: 惊吓让她一下子语塞了。

en: She was too shocked to speak.
zh: 她吓得话都说不出来了。

en: Have you recovered from the shock?
zh: 你从惊吓中缓过劲来了吗？

en: I think jogging is good exercise.
zh: 我觉得慢跑挺锻炼身体的。

en: Jogging has become the favorite form of exercise.
zh: 慢跑已经成了大家最喜欢的运动方式。

en: I was caught in a shower while I was jogging.
zh: 我慢跑的时候赶上阵雨了。

en: How about taking up jogging?
zh: 开始慢跑怎么样？

en: Try to lose weight by jogging.
zh: 试着靠慢跑来减肥吧。

en: Come on, Joe. Just a glass of beer won't hurt.
zh: 哎呀乔，就喝杯啤酒，没事的。

en: Joan dropped her husband like a hot potato.
zh: 琼迫不及待地把她丈夫甩了。

en: Joan became a great actress in spite of having had a difficult childhood.
zh: 尽管童年生活艰辛，琼还是成了一名出色的演员。

en: Joan is as charming as her sister.
zh: 琼和她姐姐一样迷人。

en: Joan broke her left arm in the accident.
zh: 琼在事故中弄断了左胳膊。

en: Joan caught her breath when she saw the sight.
zh: 琼看到那一幕时，倒吸了一口凉气。

en: Joan and Jane are sisters. The former is a pianist.
zh: 琼和简是亲姐妹，前者是个钢琴家。

en: Mrs. Jones is often unpleasant to her husband's secretary over the phone.
zh: 琼斯太太在电话里经常对她丈夫的秘书没好气。

en: The Joneses love their daughter.
zh: 琼斯一家人很疼他们的女儿。

en: There is no one who has been loved by the students more than Mr Jones.
zh: 没有哪位老师比琼斯先生更受学生爱戴了。

en: Mr Jones reprimanded me for taking a spot of shut-eye during class.
zh: 我上课打了个盹，被琼斯老师训了一顿。

en: Mr Jones is very sensitive to the nuances of English and American usage.
zh: 琼斯先生对英美英语用法的细微差别非常敏锐。

en: Mrs. Jones is teaching computer science.
zh: 琼斯太太在教计算机。

en: Mr Jones is sick and Mr Brown will teach in his place today.
zh: 琼斯先生病了，今天由布朗先生替他上课。

en: Mr Jones teaches us English conversation.
zh: 琼斯老师教我们英语口语。

en: When Mr Jones gets old, he will hand over his business to his son.
zh: 琼斯先生老了以后，会把生意交给他的儿子。

en: Mr Jones is tasting the soup his wife made.
zh: 琼斯先生在尝他太太做的汤。

en: Mr Jones believes in hard work and profits.
zh: 琼斯先生信奉勤勉和盈利。

en: It is believed that Mr Jones is a good teacher.
zh: 大家都认为琼斯先生是个好老师。

en: It is said that Mr Jones is a good teacher.
zh: 据说琼斯先生是个好老师。

en: A farewell meeting was held in honor of Mr Jones.
zh: 大家为琼斯先生举行了欢送会。

en: Professor Jones retires next year.
zh: 琼斯教授明年就退休了。

en: The Joneses pay their servant by the week.
zh: 琼斯家按周给佣人结工资。

en: Jones is well qualified for the job.
zh: 琼斯完全能胜任这项工作。

en: Mrs. Jones ordered the room to be swept by noon.
zh: 琼斯太太要求中午前把房间打扫好。

en: Is Mr Jones in the office?
zh: 琼斯先生在办公室吗？

en: Jones was born in the United States.
zh: 琼斯是在美国出生的。

en: Mr Jones was looked upon as a great scholar.
zh: 琼斯先生被视为一位了不起的学者。

en: Mr Jones made Mary go to the dentist.
zh: 琼斯先生非要让玛丽去看牙医。

en: Miss Jones made a face when she heard the news.
zh: 琼斯小姐听到这个消息时撇了撇嘴。

en: Mrs. Jones counts sheep every night to go to sleep.
zh: 琼斯太太每天晚上都靠数羊来入睡。

en: Mr Jones hasn't been here as far as I know.
zh: 据我所知，琼斯先生没来过这儿。

en: Mr Jones, whose wife teaches English, is himself a professor of English.
zh: 琼斯先生本人是英语教授，他太太也是教英语的。

en: A Mr Jones has come to see you.
zh: 有个叫琼斯的先生来找你。

en: A Mr Jones is waiting for you outside.
zh: 有个叫琼斯的先生在外面等你。

en: Joe purged himself of the suspicion.
zh: 乔洗清了自己的嫌疑。

en: Joe insisted on my paying the money.
zh: 乔非要我付钱。

en: Was Joe with you yesterday evening?
zh: 昨天晚上乔是和你在一起吗？

en: Joe looked sad yesterday?
zh: 乔昨天看起来很难过吗？

en: How soon does the show begin?
zh: 演出还有多久开始？

en: Joe excels his older brother at swimming.
zh: 乔游泳比他哥哥厉害。

en: Joe was not on speaking terms with his noisy neighbor.
zh: 乔不跟他那个吵闹的邻居说话。

en: Joe spends the majority of his time in sports.
zh: 乔把大部分时间都花在运动上了。

en: Joe was pleased at the thought of going to New York.
zh: 一想到要去纽约，乔就特别高兴。

en: Joe's nuts about the girl.
zh: 乔被那个女孩迷得神魂颠倒。

en: Joe was believed to have shot the prisoner.
zh: 大家都认为是乔开枪打死了那个囚犯。

en: The show was wonderful, but the tickets were too expensive.
zh: 演出很精彩，就是票太贵了。

en: When will the show begin?
zh: 演出什么时候开始？

en: Admission to the show is $5.
zh: 看演出的门票是5美元。

en: Joe's masculine smell made Louisa sick.
zh: 乔身上的男人味让路易莎觉得不舒服。

en: The man whose work it is to amuse people who attend a show is an entertainer.
zh: 在演出中负责逗乐观众的人被称为演艺人员。

en: It was Mr White that gave Joe this ticket.
zh: 是怀特先生给了乔这张票。

en: Joe and I saw a lion yesterday.
zh: 我和乔昨天看到了一头狮子。

en: Short skirts have already gone out.
zh: 短裙已经不流行了。

en: Mr Jordan sat down beside him.
zh: 乔丹先生在他身边坐了下来。

en: Mr Jordan woke up suddenly.
zh: 乔丹先生猛地醒了过来。

en: Mr Jordan was a little surprised.
zh: 乔丹先生感到有点意外。

en: Mr Jordan is chairperson.
zh: 乔丹先生是主席。

en: "Weren't you there?" asked Mr Jordan.
zh: “你当时不在那儿吗？”乔丹先生问道。

en: That Jordan replaced the main engine in this experiment is self-evident.
zh: 乔丹在这次实验中更换了主发动机，这是显而易见的事。

en: Mr George is liked by all the students.
zh: 学生们都很喜欢乔治老师。

en: Uncle George never visited us without some present.
zh: 乔治叔叔每次来看我们都会带礼物。

en: George Washington was the first President of the United States of America.
zh: 乔治·华盛顿是美国首任总统。

en: Mr George Bush is the forty-first president of the United States.
zh: 乔治·布什是美国第41任总统。

en: George calculated the cost of the trip.
zh: 乔治算了一下这次旅行的花费。

en: George did business in the same manner as his father.
zh: 乔治做生意的方式和他父亲一样。

en: George is not serious about his study.
zh: 乔治对待学习一点儿也不认真。

en: George did business in the same manner as his father did.
zh: 乔治像他爸爸那样做生意。

en: George is poor, but he's always happy.
zh: 乔治虽然穷，但他总是很开心。

en: George hit him in the stomach.
zh: 乔治一拳打在他的肚子上。

en: George works on a big farm.
zh: 乔治在一个大农场工作。

en: George had a lot of cheese for breakfast.
zh: 乔治早餐吃了很多奶酪。

en: George is very honest by nature.
zh: 乔治天生就很老实。

en: George does not mix much; he likes to keep to himself.
zh: 乔治不太爱社交，他喜欢独来独往。

en: George set up as a merchant.
zh: 乔治做起了买卖。

en: George was broken-hearted.
zh: 乔治伤透了心。

en: George failed in business.
zh: 乔治生意做垮了。

en: George is five years senior to me.
zh: 乔治比我大五岁。

en: George married my sister.
zh: 乔治跟我姐姐结婚了。

en: George accompanied me home.
zh: 乔治陪我回了家。

en: George sent me a birthday card.
zh: 乔治寄给我一张生日卡片。

en: George is the captain of our team.
zh: 乔治是我们队的队长。

en: George is the most diligent boy in our class.
zh: 乔治是我们班最勤奋的孩子。

en: George was tricked into buying the land.
zh: 乔治被骗去买了那块地。

en: George was livid!
zh: 乔治简直气疯了！

en: George began to climb all unawares.
zh: 乔治还没意识到就开始往上爬了。

en: George is quite talkative.
zh: 乔治话挺多的。

en: George was so tired that his doctor advised him to take better care of himself.
zh: 乔治太累了，医生建议他多注意身体。

en: George is reluctant to take on that difficult job.
zh: 乔治不怎么愿意接那个苦差事。

en: George put a chain on the dog.
zh: 乔治给狗拴上了链子。

en: George encouraged Ellie to study hard again.
zh: 乔治又一次鼓励艾莉要努力学习。

en: George seems a good boy.
zh: 乔治看起来是个好孩子。

en: George doesn't mix much; he likes to keep to himself.
zh: 乔治不太跟人打交道，他喜欢一个人待着。

en: Jorge is able to speak four languages.
zh: 豪尔赫能说四种语言。

en: George felt the train begin to move.
zh: 乔治感觉到火车开始动了。

en: George was describing a 30 pound bass he'd caught recently after fighting it for three hours.
zh: 乔治在描述他最近抓到的一条30磅重的鲈鱼，说他跟那鱼搏斗了三个小时。

en: George weighs not less than 70 kilograms.
zh: 乔治的体重不少于70公斤。

en: George's sister made me some sandwiches.
zh: 乔治的姐姐给我做了些三明治。

en: George has an incredibly large Adam's apple.
zh: 乔治的喉结大得惊人。

en: George has two cousins; one lives in Germany and the other in Switzerland.
zh: 乔治有两个表亲，一个住在德国，另一个住在瑞士。

en: A man named George was staying at a hotel.
zh: 一个叫乔治的人住在一家旅馆里。

en: That George will come is certain.
zh: 乔治肯定会来的。

en: I don't know if George is coming.
zh: 我不知道乔治会不会来。

en: Do you know where George bought his tennis racket?
zh: 你知道乔治在哪儿买的网球拍吗？

en: I'm not sure if George will take to this idea.
zh: 我不确定乔治会不会喜欢这个主意。

en: Georgia is his native state.
zh: 佐治亚州是他的家乡。

en: George III has been unfairly maligned by historians.
zh: 历史学家对乔治三世的评价一直不太公平。

en: George Washington was born in 1732.
zh: 乔治·华盛顿出生于1732年。

en: George Johnson is in really fine form.
zh: 乔治·约翰逊最近的状态特别好。

en: Son, I have to talk with you. Look at your mother, George.
zh: 儿子，我有话跟你说。乔治，你看看你妈。

en: Just come to see me any time you feel like it, George.
zh: 乔治，你想见我的时候随时过来就行。

en: George, if you are not listening to the radio, turn it off.
zh: 乔治，你要是不听收音机就把它关了。

en: You should consult a doctor at once, George.
zh: 乔治，你得马上去看医生。

en: There are some who don't see a joke.
zh: 有些人根本听不懂笑话。

en: The dress in the window caught my eye.
zh: 橱窗里的那件衣服让我眼前一亮。

en: Grow up, Joe.
zh: 成熟点吧，乔。

en: Excuse me, Joe, can I use your phone?
zh: 不好意思，乔，能借下你手机吗？

en: Mr Joel is now on duty.
zh: 乔尔先生现在正在值班。

en: It is not easy to speak English well.
zh: 想把英语说好可不容易。

en: It's not Joan. You are wrong.
zh: 不是琼，你搞错了。

en: Junko still depends on her parents for her living expenses.
zh: 纯子现在还得靠父母给的生活费过日子。

en: When she saw the gorgeous coat, Julie decided to buy it.
zh: 朱莉看到那件漂亮的大衣，就决定把它买下来。

en: Julie gains 20 pounds every month from her eating binge.
zh: 朱莉因为暴饮暴食，每个月都要重20磅。

en: Julie received a Christmas card from her brother in Italy.
zh: 朱莉收到了她在意大利的哥哥寄来的圣诞卡。

en: It floored me that Julie was coming for a visit tomorrow.
zh: 朱莉明天要来看我，这真让我大吃一惊。

en: Don't waste money on clothes, Julie. Save money!
zh: 朱莉，别在衣服上乱花钱了，攒点钱吧！

en: Julia felt like crying when she heard the news.
zh: 茱莉亚听到那个消息时想哭。

en: Julia's native language is Italian.
zh: 茱莉亚的母语是意大利语。

en: Is Mr Schmidt at home now?
zh: 施密特先生现在在家吗？

en: Schweitzer was a musician as well as a doctor.
zh: 施韦泽既是医生也是音乐家。

en: Tom picked up some pretty shells on the beach.
zh: 汤姆在海滩上捡了一些漂亮的贝壳。

en: Judy will talk about Japan tomorrow.
zh: 朱迪明天要聊聊日本。

en: Judy decided to wear her new bikini.
zh: 朱迪决定穿上她的新比基尼。

en: Judy smiled at me.
zh: 朱迪对我笑了笑。

en: Judy laughed at me.
zh: 朱迪嘲笑我。

en: Judy was born on the morning of September 5.
zh: 朱迪是9月5号早上出生的。

en: Judy is a most clever student.
zh: 朱迪是个非常聪明的学生。

en: Judy is fond of dancing.
zh: 朱迪很喜欢跳舞。

en: Judy isn't a good singer, is she?
zh: 朱迪唱歌不太好听吧？

en: Judy is smart.
zh: 朱迪挺聪明的。

en: Judy dances very well.
zh: 朱迪跳舞跳得非常好。

en: Please give my best regards to Judy.
zh: 请代我向朱迪问好。

en: Who runs faster, Judy or Tony?
zh: 朱迪和托尼谁跑得快？

en: I'd like to speak to Judy.
zh: 我想找一下朱迪。

en: Judy spent hours on end writing and rewriting her essay.
zh: 朱迪花了好几个小时在那反复修改她的论文。

en: Judy sent her children to bed.
zh: 朱迪让孩子们去睡觉了。

en: Judy spends a lot of time looking in the mirror.
zh: 朱迪总是在那照镜子，一照就是半天。

en: Judy is the only woman on the board.
zh: 朱迪是董事会里唯一的女性。

en: Judy is kind to everyone.
zh: 朱迪对谁都很友善。

en: Judy likes him.
zh: 朱迪喜欢他。

en: I'm looking for something to clean the carpet with.
zh: 我在找能清理地毯的东西。

en: The rugs are a good match for the curtains.
zh: 地毯和窗帘很搭。

en: The color of the carpet is in harmony with the wall.
zh: 地毯的颜色跟墙面挺协调的。

en: Some juice, please.
zh: 麻烦给我来点果汁。

en: Don't drop cigarette ash on the carpet.
zh: 别把烟灰掉在地毯上。

en: I want a dozen cream puffs.
zh: 我要一打奶油泡芙。

en: Maybe just a short one.
zh: 也许就一小会儿吧。

en: Schweitzer is a man to imitate.
zh: 施韦泽是个值得效仿的人。

en: Good. Now go down with it.
zh: 好。现在拿着它下去吧。

en: Then what?
zh: 然后呢？

en: No pro golfer in Japan is as popular as Jumbo Ozaki.
zh: 在日本，没有哪个职业高尔夫球手像尾崎将司这么受欢迎。

en: The jumbo jet touched down thundering.
zh: 那架巨型喷气式客机轰鸣着降落了。

en: I'll take a glass of champagne.
zh: 我想要一杯香槟。

en: A shampoo and a set, please.
zh: 麻烦洗个头，再做个造型。

en: We used up the shampoo.
zh: 我们把洗发水用光了。

en: The champagne cork popped out.
zh: 香槟塞子“砰”的一声弹了出来。

en: The champagne bubbled in the glass.
zh: 香槟在杯子里冒着泡。

en: What are those cards, Jan?
zh: 简，那些是什么卡片？

en: I'd like a single with a shower, please.
zh: 我想要一间带淋浴的单人房。

en: May I take a shower?
zh: 我能洗个澡吗？

en: I felt refreshed after showering.
zh: 洗完澡后我感觉精神多了。

en: There's no water coming out of the shower.
zh: 淋浴头不出水了。

en: I'll take a shower.
zh: 我去洗个澡。

en: Do you have any rooms with a shower and toilet?
zh: 你们有带独立卫浴的房间吗？

en: I can't turn the shower off. Could you check it for me?
zh: 淋浴关不上了，能帮我检查一下吗？

en: This shower is broken.
zh: 这个淋浴器坏了。

en: Sharon must be a go-getter.
zh: 沙伦肯定是个很有干劲的人。

en: Take the jam down from the top shelf.
zh: 把最顶层架子上的果酱拿下来。

en: Is this the only difficulty in the way?
zh: 这是唯一的阻碍吗？

en: Please remove that chair because it is in the way.
zh: 请把那把椅子挪开，它挡路了。

en: I'm sorry to have disturbed you.
zh: 抱歉打扰到你了。

en: The bubble burst in the air.
zh: 气泡在空中破灭了。

en: Unable to speak, he wrote it on a piece of paper.
zh: 因为没法说话，他把它写在了纸上。

en: Quit talking, will you?
zh: 别说了行吗？

en: I'm able to speak, and only speak, Japanese.
zh: 我会说，而且只会说日语。

en: His hands quivered when he began to speak.
zh: 他开口说话时，手在发抖。

en: I talked myself hoarse.
zh: 我嗓子都说哑了。

en: Hold your tongue and listen to me.
zh: 闭嘴，听我说。

en: The Japan Times was carrying the story.
zh: 《日本时报》报道了这件事。

en: Set a thief to catch a thief.
zh: 以贼捉贼。

en: They call women who make a hobby out of collecting Chanel goods "Chanellers".
zh: 他们把那些热衷于搜集香奈儿产品的女性称为“香奈儿迷”。

en: Janet was seeking for fame in the world of show business.
zh: 珍妮特当时想在演艺圈成名。

en: Janet sure knows how to stretch a dollar.
zh: 珍妮特真的很会精打细算。

en: Janet bought a skirt and a blouse.
zh: 珍妮特买了一件半身裙和一件衬衫。

en: Janet always lets me use her typewriter.
zh: 珍妮特总是把她的打字机借给我用。

en: Janet's dress is similar in appearance to her sister's.
zh: 珍妮特的裙子看起来和她姐姐的差不多。

en: Janet and Bill are going to get hitched in June.
zh: 珍妮特和比尔打算六月份结婚。

en: Word got around that Jeanette and Dave were having an affair.
zh: 消息传开了，说珍妮特和戴夫有私情。

en: It looks like Janet's going to be kicked upstairs.
zh: 看来珍妮特要被“明升暗降”了。

en: Janet, tend to the baby, please.
zh: 珍妮特，请照看下孩子。

en: Remove your shirt and lie down.
zh: 脱掉上衣，躺下。

en: Please take off your shirt.
zh: 请把衬衫脱了。

en: Change your shirt. It's very dirty.
zh: 换件衬衫吧，这件太脏了。

en: I mended my torn shirt, too.
zh: 我也把我那件破了的衬衫补好了。

en: You must change your shirt - it's got wet.
zh: 你得换件衬衫，这件湿透了。

en: The second button of your shirt is coming off.
zh: 你衬衫的第二个扣子快掉了。

en: What is that greasy stuff on your shirt?
zh: 你衬衫上那块油乎乎的东西是什么？

en: I have to iron my shirt.
zh: 我得熨一下我的衬衫。

en: Please iron the shirt.
zh: 把这件衬衫烫一下。

en: Could you press this button?
zh: 能按一下这个按钮吗？

en: You can count on Jack.
zh: 你可以指望杰克。

en: I hiccup a lot.
zh: 我经常打嗝。

en: You are welcome, Jack!
zh: 不客气，杰克！

en: Jack decided to cancel the reservations.
zh: 杰克决定取消预订。

en: Jack bought a present for his friend.
zh: 杰克给他的朋友买了个礼物。

en: Jack was never to see his sister again.
zh: 杰克再也没能见到他的妹妹。

en: Jack explained to me how to change the wheel of the car.
zh: 杰克跟我讲了怎么换车轮。

en: Jack was caught for setting fire to the house.
zh: 杰克因为放火烧房子被抓了。

en: Jack broke his mother's valuable vase, but he didn't do it on purpose, so she wasn't angry.
zh: 杰克打碎了他妈妈名贵的花瓶，但他不是故意的，所以她没生气。

en: Jack was pacing up and down in the room, lost in thought.
zh: 杰克在房间里走来走去，陷入了沉思。

en: Jack resembles his father.
zh: 杰克长得挺像他爸爸。

en: It seems that Jack is sick.
zh: 杰克好像生病了。

en: Jack was looking well, although tired.
zh: 杰克虽然很累，但气色还挺好。

en: Scarcely had Jack seen her, he burst out crying.
zh: 杰克一见到她就大哭起来。

en: It is hard to convince Jack.
zh: 很难说服杰克。

en: Jack reached out for the magazine on the shelf.
zh: 杰克伸手去拿书架上的杂志。

en: Jack tried to evade paying his taxes.
zh: 杰克想方设法偷税漏税。

en: Jack is wise beyond all others.
zh: 杰克比所有人都聪明。

en: Jack is an early riser.
zh: 杰克习惯早起。

en: Jack resigned from his job in despair.
zh: 杰克心灰意冷地辞了职。

en: Jack made no mistakes in the math test.
zh: 杰克数学考试一个错都没出。

en: Jack collects stamps.
zh: 杰克集邮。

en: Jack has no object in life.
zh: 杰克的人生没什么目标。

en: Jack was laughed at by all the boys.
zh: 所有的男孩子都笑话杰克。

en: Jack has a cat under his arm.
zh: 杰克腋下夹着一只猫。

en: Jack is very severe with his children.
zh: 杰克对他的孩子非常严厉。

en: Jack exchanged the cow for the seeds.
zh: 杰克用牛换了一些种子。

en: Jack is one of my friends.
zh: 杰克是我的一个朋友。

en: Jack is three years senior to me.
zh: 杰克比我大三岁。

en: Jack played a dirty trick on me.
zh: 杰克耍花招整了我。

en: Jack is busy cooking for us.
zh: 杰克正忙着给我们做饭呢。

en: Jack made a lot of mistakes in his composition.
zh: 杰克的作文里错了很多。

en: Jack is bound to succeed this time.
zh: 杰克这次肯定能成功。

en: Jack is now either in London or Paris.
zh: 杰克现在要么在伦敦，要么在巴黎。

en: Jack said he had never told a lie, but he was lying.
zh: 杰克说他从不撒谎，其实他就在撒谎。

en: Jack was lost sight of in the crowd.
zh: 杰克在人群中消失了。

en: Jack insisted on having a living room to himself.
zh: 杰克坚持要一个人住一间起居室。

en: Jack may have taken my umbrella by mistake.
zh: 杰克可能是拿错我的伞了。

en: Jack is interested in painting.
zh: 杰克对画画很感兴趣。

en: Everybody laughed at Jack.
zh: 大家都笑话杰克。

en: Jack is a powerful acquisition for our team.
zh: 杰克是我们团队的一员猛将。

en: Jack hid the dish he had broken, but his little sister told on him.
zh: 杰克把打碎的盘子藏了起来，但他妹妹告发了他。

en: Jack keeps a cat and a parrot at home.
zh: 杰克在家里养了一只猫和一只鹦鹉。

en: Jack speaks English.
zh: 杰克会说英语。

en: Jack is an evil boy full of evil ideas.
zh: 杰克是个满肚子坏主意的坏孩子。

en: Jack once gave a helping hand to Robert, who was in trouble; and now Robert, in turn, is of great help to Jack.
zh: 杰克曾经帮过身处困境的罗伯特，现在轮到罗伯特帮杰克的大忙了。

en: Jack made me go there against my will.
zh: 杰克违背我的意愿非要我去那儿。

en: Jack can speak French.
zh: 杰克会说法语。

en: Jack brushed the dust off his coat.
zh: 杰克掸了掸大衣上的灰。

en: What about Jack?
zh: 杰克呢？

en: Jack will not answer my letters.
zh: 杰克就是不回我的信。

en: All Jack does is sleep.
zh: 杰克整天就知道睡觉。

en: Jack is Mary's second cousin, I believe.
zh: 我觉得杰克是玛丽的远房表亲。

en: Jack insists that he has nothing to do with the crime.
zh: 杰克坚称这起案子跟他没关系。

en: Jack seems to regret it deeply.
zh: 杰克好像挺后悔的。

en: Jack would often go jogging there.
zh: 杰克以前经常在那儿慢跑。

en: Jack may speak Spanish, too.
zh: 杰克可能也会说西班牙语。

en: Jack doesn't drive fast.
zh: 杰克开车不快。

en: Jack is the tallest boy in his class.
zh: 杰克是他们班最高的男生。

en: Jack is the most intelligent boy in the class.
zh: 杰克是班里最聪明的男生。

en: Jack always finds fault with others. That's why everybody avoids him.
zh: 杰克老爱找别人的茬，所以大家都躲着他。

en: Jack was born on August tenth.
zh: 杰克是八月十号出生的。

en: Jack has been living in New York for six years.
zh: 杰克在纽约住了六年了。

en: Jack was tired from having walked fifty miles.
zh: 杰克走了五十英里，累坏了。

en: Jack stopped talking all of a sudden when Mary went into the room.
zh: 玛丽一进屋，杰克突然就不说话了。

en: Jack bores me with stories about his trip.
zh: 杰克老跟我讲他旅行的事儿，听得我烦死了。

en: Jack's adventures are more amazing than those of the hero in many thrillers.
zh: 杰克的冒险经历比许多惊悚片里的男主角还精彩。

en: Jack's problem is that his wife spends more than he earns.
zh: 杰克愁的是他老婆花得比他挣得还多。

en: Jack's car is a recent model.
zh: 杰克的车是新款。

en: Who is the pretty girl sitting beside Jack?
zh: 坐在杰克旁边那个漂亮姑娘是谁？

en: Jack can't afford to buy a new bicycle.
zh: 杰克买不起新自行车。

en: How long have you known Jack?
zh: 你认识杰克多久了？

en: Jack and I agreed to work at the office on Saturdays by turns.
zh: 我跟杰克商量好了周六轮流在办公室值班。

en: Who was at the party beside Jack and Mary?
zh: 除了杰克和玛丽，派对上还有谁？

en: Jack and Betty have been going steady for a month.
zh: 杰克和贝蒂已经好了一个月了。

en: Jack and Peggy were married by the Rev. John Smith.
zh: 杰克和佩吉的婚礼是由约翰·史密斯牧师主持的。

en: Jack, Jill and Alice went up the hill.
zh: 杰克、吉尔和爱丽丝上山了。

en: Jack Daniel's is a Tennessee whiskey.
zh: 杰克丹尼是种田纳西威士忌。

en: We are all poor swimmers with the possible exception of Jack.
zh: 咱们游泳都挺差的，杰克可能除外。

en: Jack isn't here. He may have missed his usual bus.
zh: 杰克不在，他可能没赶上平时坐的那班车。

en: It was the window that Jack broke yesterday.
zh: 这就是杰克昨天打破的那扇窗户。

en: It isn't true that Jack is no good at music; on the contrary, he plays the piano well.
zh: 谁说杰克没音乐细胞？相反，他钢琴弹得可好了。

en: It was yesterday that Jake broke this window.
zh: 杰克是昨天砸破这扇窗户的。

en: Jack isn't here.
zh: 杰克不在这儿。

en: Don't be so wild, Jack.
zh: 杰克，别那么疯。

en: Jackie's efforts to help homeless people backfired on her.
zh: 杰基想帮那些流浪汉，结果反倒给自己惹了麻烦。

en: Two shirts and suits, please. There's a stain here.
zh: 麻烦洗两件衬衫和两套西服，这儿有个污渍。

en: Your shirt is inside out.
zh: 你的衣服穿反了。

en: Jazz is not my speciality.
zh: 我对爵士乐不太在行。

en: Jazz uses the same notes that Bach used.
zh: 爵士乐用的音符跟巴赫用的是一样的。

en: Good day. See you soon.
zh: 你好，回头见。

en: It looks like Jacob has been bitten by the love bug.
zh: 看来雅各布是坠入爱河了。

en: What annoys me is that, although I object, she insists on buying it.
zh: 让我烦的是，虽然我反对，她还是非要买。

en: Miss Jackson did not appear.
zh: 杰克逊小姐没露面。

en: I'll boil you the potatoes.
zh: 我去给你煮点土豆。

en: I want some potatoes. Do you have any?
zh: 我想要点土豆，你这儿有吗？

en: The potato is native to the highlands of Central and South America.
zh: 土豆原产于中南美洲的高原地区。

en: Potatoes were introduced by the Dutch from Jakarta.
zh: 土豆是荷兰人从雅加达引进的。

en: When were potatoes introduced into Japan?
zh: 土豆是什么时候传到日本的？

en: Please scrape the skin off the potatoes.
zh: 请把土豆皮刮掉。

en: Potatoes were being cooked in the kitchen by the girls.
zh: 女孩子们正在厨房里煮土豆。

en: Ms Jaguar offered Mr Clinton the position because she had faith in his capabilities.
zh: 贾格尔女士因为看好克林顿先生的能力，所以给了他那个职位。

en: But ... did that tenth child have a different father to the ones before him?
zh: 但是……那个第十个孩子和之前的那些孩子不是同一个父亲吗？

en: Shylock is greedy, and what is worse, very stingy.
zh: 夏洛克很贪婪，更糟的是，他还特别抠门。

en: Beat the Giants!
zh: 打败巨人队！

en: The Giants lost the game by 20 points.
zh: 巨人队输了20分。

en: The Giants were well on the way to defeat.
zh: 巨人队眼看就要输了。

en: Which do you like better, the Giants or the Dragons?
zh: 巨人队和龙队，你更喜欢哪一个？

en: Let's hit the hay.
zh: 咱们睡觉去吧。

en: Can you order one for me?
zh: 你能帮我也订一个吗？

en: Let's build on your plan.
zh: 咱们就在你这个计划的基础上继续吧。

en: How old is he then?
zh: 那他到底多大了？

en: I always thought that Shirley and Alan would get together.
zh: 我一直以为雪莉和艾伦会在一起。

en: Could you lend me a few mechanical pencil leads?
zh: 能借我几根自动铅芯吗？

en: See you at the party.
zh: 派对上见。

en: I hope to be a journalist.
zh: 我希望以后能当个记者。

en: His career as a journalist was full of distinguished achievements.
zh: 他的记者生涯成就非凡。

en: Until then.
zh: 到时候见。

en: Let me tell you something.
zh: 我跟你说件事。

en: Can I have the key now, please?
zh: 麻烦现在能把钥匙给我了吗？

en: So you give up, right?
zh: 所以你放弃了，对吧？

en: Well, I'll tell you how to spell my name.
zh: 好吧，我告诉你我的名字怎么拼。

en: Sounds like a pretty good idea, after all.
zh: 说到底，这主意听起来还挺不错的。

en: I'll meet you at the ball park.
zh: 我们在棒球场见。

en: A damp, cold day affects a person's health.
zh: 这种阴冷潮湿的天气对身体不好。

en: All but Jim came.
zh: 除了吉姆，大家都来了。

en: Did anybody other than Jim see her?
zh: 除了吉姆，还有人见过她吗？

en: We tried to persuade Jim to join us.
zh: 我们试着劝过吉姆加入我们。

en: Jim is coming to the party, too.
zh: 吉姆也要来参加派对。

en: Jim is taller than any of his friends.
zh: 吉姆比他所有的朋友都高。

en: Jim is a man of his word.
zh: 吉姆是个说话算数的人。

en: Jim studies far into the night.
zh: 吉姆总是学习到深夜。

en: Jim awoke and found himself alone in the room.
zh: 吉姆醒来时发现房间里只剩他一个人了。

en: Jim drove too fast, which was reckless.
zh: 吉姆开车太快了，真是不计后果。

en: Jim is not a lawyer but a doctor.
zh: 吉姆不是律师，而是医生。

en: Jim mastered French and German.
zh: 吉姆精通法语和德语。

en: Jim went fishing from the pier.
zh: 吉姆在码头钓鱼。

en: Jim accompanied her on the piano.
zh: 吉姆用钢琴为她伴奏。

en: Jim went back to London for the purpose of seeing her.
zh: 吉姆回伦敦就是为了见她。

en: Jim could hear whom she was phoning.
zh: 吉姆能听到她在给谁打电话。

en: Jim is crazy about his girlfriend.
zh: 吉姆对他女朋友着了迷。

en: Jim was born in the same year as he.
zh: 吉姆和他同岁。

en: You cannot rely upon Jim's words since he tries to please everybody.
zh: 吉姆的话不靠谱，因为他总想讨好所有人。

en: Jim has a white hat on his head.
zh: 吉姆头上戴着一顶白帽子。

en: Jim can read Japanese.
zh: 吉姆能看懂日文。

en: Jim has learned to like Japanese dishes.
zh: 吉姆已经开始喜欢吃日本菜了。

en: Jim has learned to like Japan.
zh: 吉姆已经慢慢喜欢上日本了。

en: Jim was afraid of physical labor.
zh: 吉姆以前很怕干体力活。

en: Jim answered my question without difficulty.
zh: 吉姆很轻松地回答了我的问题。

en: Jim is about to take a trip to southeast Asia.
zh: 吉姆正打算去东南亚旅游。

en: Jim slipped on the icy road and got hurt.
zh: 吉姆在结冰的路上滑倒受伤了。

en: Jim was able to hold back his anger.
zh: 吉姆忍住了没发火。

en: Jim was able to hold back his anger and avoid a fight.
zh: 吉姆忍住了怒火，没吵起来。

en: Jim is watering the garden.
zh: 吉姆正在给花园浇水。

en: Jim jumped for joy when the news came.
zh: 听到那个消息，吉姆高兴得跳了起来。

en: Jim was counted out in the seventh round.
zh: 吉姆在第七回合被数秒判负了。

en: Jim kicks a ball very well.
zh: 吉姆球踢得非常好。

en: Jim can be said to be a man of many talents.
zh: 吉姆可以说是多才多艺。

en: Jim climbed out of the boat on to the bank.
zh: 吉姆从船上下来走到了岸上。

en: Jim suggested that the teacher might be wrong.
zh: 吉姆提出来老师可能弄错了。

en: Jim wrote to me last week and said he had come back two months before.
zh: 吉姆上周给我写信说他两个月前就回来了。

en: Jim went into the room quietly lest he should wake the baby.
zh: 吉姆悄悄进了房间，怕吵醒孩子。

en: Jim got dismissed for his misconduct in office.
zh: 吉姆因为在单位表现不当被开除了。

en: Jim says he goes jogging at least three times a week.
zh: 吉姆说他每周至少去跑三次步。

en: Jim seems to know the art of making friends with girls.
zh: 吉姆好像挺懂怎么跟女孩子相处。

en: Jim went out, but Mary stayed home.
zh: 吉姆出去了，玛丽留在了家里。

en: Jim burned the midnight oil when he was preparing for the examination.
zh: 吉姆准备考试那阵子一直在开夜车。

en: Jim set out to write something in his notebook.
zh: 吉姆开始在笔记本上写起东西来。

en: Jim put his hand up.
zh: 吉姆举起了手。

en: Jim is at work on his car.
zh: 吉姆正忙着修车呢。

en: Jim is learning how to drive a car.
zh: 吉姆正在学开车。

en: Jim persists in his opinion.
zh: 吉姆坚持他的看法。

en: Jim attributes his success to hard work.
zh: 吉姆把成功归功于努力工作。

en: Jim boasts of having passed the exam.
zh: 吉姆显摆他考过试了。

en: Jim was caught cheating in the examination.
zh: 吉姆考试作弊被抓住了。

en: Jim wants whipping for insulting me.
zh: 吉姆居然侮辱我，真是欠收拾。

en: Jim called me a coward.
zh: 吉姆骂我是个胆小鬼。

en: Jim pointed out some grammatical mistakes in my composition.
zh: 吉姆指出了我作文里的几个语法错误。

en: Jim is in my black book.
zh: 吉姆进了我的黑名单。

en: Jim called me a cab.
zh: 吉姆帮我叫了辆车。

en: Jim said that he wouldn't mind waiting for us.
zh: 吉姆说他不介意等我们。

en: Jim left Paris yesterday.
zh: 吉姆昨天离开巴黎了。

en: Jim will not come today.
zh: 吉姆今天不来了。

en: Jim stayed with us while he was in Japan as an exchange student.
zh: 吉姆在日本当交换生期间是跟我们住在一起的。

en: We believed that Jim had made a mistake.
zh: 我们当时觉得吉姆搞错了。

en: Jim turned the key in the lock.
zh: 吉姆把钥匙插进锁孔拧了拧。

en: Jim has broad shoulders.
zh: 吉姆的肩膀很宽。

en: Jim studies as hard as his brother does.
zh: 吉姆学习跟他哥哥一样用功。

en: Jim will accept your proposal.
zh: 吉姆会接受你的建议的。

en: Jim is not the man that you think him to be.
zh: 吉姆不是你想的那种人。

en: Jim is liked by all his classmates.
zh: 吉姆的同学都挺喜欢他的。

en: As soon as Jim got home, he made a beeline for the rest room.
zh: 吉姆一到家就直冲厕所。

en: Jim is studying hard for his finals.
zh: 吉姆正拼命复习准备期末考呢。

en: Jim drove his car, whistling merrily.
zh: 吉姆一边开车，一边欢快地吹着口哨。

en: Jim had hardly got home when he crept into bed.
zh: 吉姆刚一到家就钻进被窝了。

en: Jim really knows his way around the store from his years working there.
zh: 吉姆在那家店干了这么多年，对那儿门儿清。

en: Jim is above any of his classmates in English.
zh: 吉姆的英语水平在全班是数一数二的。

en: Jim's angry because his date for the movie stood him up and he wasted an hour waiting for her in the rain.
zh: 吉姆很生气，因为约好看电影的人放了他鸽子，害他在雨里白等了一小时。

en: Though Jim works very hard, his job does not pay very much.
zh: 虽然吉姆工作很努力，但挣得并不多。

en: Jim runs as fast as Ron.
zh: 吉姆跑得跟罗恩一样快。

en: Jim has gone to London.
zh: 吉姆去伦敦了。

en: Jim doesn't like apples, does he?
zh: 吉姆不喜欢吃苹果，对吧？

en: Jim made a superfluous remark.
zh: 吉姆多说了一句废话。

en: Jim works hard, but John is idle.
zh: 吉姆工作很卖力，但约翰却整天游手好闲。

en: Jim promised me not to come again.
zh: 吉姆答应我不再来了。

en: Jim is not yet used to driving on the left side of the road.
zh: 吉姆还不习惯靠左开车。

en: Jim fell in love with Mary the moment he met her.
zh: 吉姆对玛丽一见钟情。

en: Jim got a job as a waiter.
zh: 吉姆找了个当服务员的工作。

en: Jim hasn't come yet.
zh: 吉姆还没来。

en: Jim hasn't been home yet.
zh: 吉姆还没回家呢。

en: Jim dropped his pen and bent to pick it up.
zh: 吉姆的笔掉了，他弯腰去捡。

en: Jim is about as tall as Bill.
zh: 吉姆和比尔差不多高。

en: Jim likes to play the drum.
zh: 吉姆喜欢打鼓。

en: Jim goes to school by bus.
zh: 吉姆坐公交车上学。

en: "How does Jim go to school?" "He goes by bus."
zh: “吉姆怎么上学？”“他坐公交车。”

en: Jim was so tired that he lay down and slept.
zh: 吉姆太累了，躺下就睡着了。

en: Where is Jim?
zh: 吉姆在哪儿？

en: Jim kicked the ball very hard.
zh: 吉姆用力踢了那个球。

en: Jim likes the doctor.
zh: 吉姆挺喜欢那个医生的。

en: I've heard Jim rejected the proposal.
zh: 我听说吉姆拒绝了那个提议。

en: Jim must be hospitalized at once.
zh: 吉姆必须立刻住院。

en: Jim pulled a muscle in his leg while skiing.
zh: 吉姆滑雪的时候拉伤了腿部肌肉。

en: Jim has been trying to take me out to dinner for the last three weeks.
zh: 这三周来，吉姆一直想约我出去吃晚饭。

en: Jim seized Julie by the arm.
zh: 吉姆抓住了朱莉的胳膊。

en: Jim had his camera stolen.
zh: 吉姆的相机被偷了。

en: Jim is on bad terms with his classmates.
zh: 吉姆和同学关系不太好。

en: Jim knows most anything about motorcycles.
zh: 关于摩托车，吉姆几乎什么都懂。

en: Jim resembles his father.
zh: 吉姆长得很像他爸爸。

en: Jim didn't wake up until his mother woke him.
zh: 直到被他妈妈叫醒，吉姆才起来。

en: Jim has been laid up with flu for three days.
zh: 吉姆得了流感，已经卧床三天了。

en: Jim has asked Anne out several times.
zh: 吉姆约过安妮好几次了。

en: It seemed that Jim had missed the seven o'clock train.
zh: 看来吉姆没赶上七点那班火车。

en: Jim ate three apples and said he could eat as many again.
zh: 吉姆吃了三个苹果，还说他能再吃三个。

en: Jim acted very strangely all day.
zh: 吉姆整天表现得很奇怪。

en: Jim sat alone with his arms folded.
zh: 吉姆双手抱胸，独自坐着。

en: Jim got down from the tree.
zh: 吉姆从树上爬了下来。

en: Jim makes a point of jogging three miles every day.
zh: 吉姆坚持每天慢跑三英里。

en: Jim is not what he was.
zh: 吉姆不再是以前那个样子了。

en: Jim is Canadian.
zh: 吉姆是加拿大人。

en: Jim wrote the letter for Betty.
zh: 吉姆替贝蒂写了那封信。

en: Jim is what is called an absent-minded student.
zh: 吉姆就是那种所谓心不在焉的学生。

en: Jim's parents agreed to his marriage with Susan.
zh: 吉姆的父母同意了他和苏珊的婚事。

en: Jim's father always comes home late.
zh: 吉姆的爸爸总是回家很晚。

en: Jim's college boasts the finest view in the city.
zh: 吉姆所在的大学拥有全市最美的景色。

en: Jim's uncle is due to retire next year.
zh: 吉姆的叔叔明年就要退休了。

en: I can't go along with Jim's plan.
zh: 我没法赞同吉姆的计划。

en: Don't speak ill of Jim in his absence.
zh: 别在吉姆背后说他的坏话。

en: Jim is no more to blame than you are.
zh: 这事儿吉姆并不比你更该受责备。

en: Why don't you share your cookies with Jim?
zh: 你怎么不把饼干分点儿给吉姆呢？

en: She was glad to have Jim say her name.
zh: 吉姆叫了她的名字，她特别开心。

en: The girl talking with Jim is Mary.
zh: 那个正跟吉姆聊天的女孩是玛丽。

en: Jim and Mike threw the ball back and forth.
zh: 吉姆和迈克在在那儿互相扔球玩儿。

en: Do you know where Jim and Nancy are?
zh: 你知道吉姆和南希在哪儿吗？

en: Jim is short for James.
zh: 吉姆是詹姆斯的简称。

en: Not only Jim but his parents are sick.
zh: 不仅是吉姆，连他爸妈也病了。

en: We had been talking about Jim when he entered the room.
zh: 吉姆进屋的时候，我们正聊他呢。

en: Jim stayed at my house.
zh: 吉姆住在我家。

en: Either Jim or I have to tell her about it.
zh: 要么吉姆去，要么我去，反正得有人把这事儿告诉她。

en: Two years have passed since Jim graduated from high school.
zh: 吉姆高中毕业都两年了。

en: I wish Jim would behave himself.
zh: 我真希望吉姆能表现得好点儿。

en: Jim opens the door.
zh: 吉姆把门开了。

en: It is certain that Jim stayed at home that day.
zh: 那天吉姆肯定待在家里。

en: How long have you known Jim Robinson?
zh: 你认识吉姆·罗宾逊多久了？

en: Jim Waller is a strong candidate for the post of sales manager.
zh: 吉姆·沃勒是销售经理职位的有力人选。

en: Jim, don't run about in the room.
zh: 吉姆，别在屋里乱跑。

en: Shut the window, Jim.
zh: 吉姆，把窗户关一下。

en: I couldn't scrub the stain out.
zh: 这污渍我怎么刷也刷不掉。

en: Jimmy was accustomed to his friends making fun of him.
zh: 吉米已经习惯了被朋友们开玩笑。

en: Jimmy is easy for me to get along with.
zh: 我觉得吉米这人挺好相处的。

en: Jimmy often comes to see me on weekends.
zh: 吉米周末经常来看我。

en: Is Jimmy writing a letter?
zh: 吉米在写信吗？

en: Jimmy knows everything about cars.
zh: 吉米对车的事儿了如指掌。

en: Jimmy insisted on my taking him to the zoo.
zh: 吉米非要让我带他去动物园。

en: Jimmy was hurt in a traffic accident.
zh: 吉米在交通事故中受伤了。

en: Jimmy will often sit up all night.
zh: 吉米经常熬通宵。

en: Jimmy is coughing badly because he has a cold.
zh: 吉米感冒了，咳得很厉害。

en: Jimmy is to some extent capable of performing this operation.
zh: 吉米在一定程度上是能做这个手术的。

en: Jimmy is junior to me by two years.
zh: 吉米比我小两岁。

en: Jimmy's pictures were different from other people's.
zh: 吉米的画和别人的不一样。

en: Say hello to Jimmy.
zh: 替我向吉米问个好。

en: Jimmy was not at home, as is often the case with him.
zh: 吉米不在家，他这人经常这样。

en: Jimmy insist on my taking him to the zoo.
zh: 吉米非要让我带他去动物园。

en: It is time you went to bed, Jimmy.
zh: 吉米，你该去睡觉了。

en: Jimmy, breakfast is ready. Come downstairs.
zh: 吉米，早饭好了，快下楼吃吧。

en: Oh, no. I broke a string in my racket.
zh: 哎呀，我球拍断了一根弦。

en: Oh no! I wasn't paying attention and left my cell phone in the restaurant!
zh: 坏了！我刚才没留神，把手机落饭馆了！

en: The Siberian Railway is at once the longest and best known railway in the world.
zh: 西伯利亚铁路既是世界上最长的铁路，也是最出名的。

en: The Siberian tiger is on the verge of extinction.
zh: 东北虎已经濒临灭绝了。

en: He impatiently asked for repayment.
zh: 他不耐烦地催着还钱。

en: Don't eat till the numbness wears off.
zh: 等麻劲儿过了再吃东西。

en: Let's wait for a while and see how you do.
zh: 咱们先等会儿，看情况再说吧。

en: If you sleep for a while, you will feel much better.
zh: 你要是睡会儿觉，感觉会好很多的。

en: The recovery of Japan's economy, which has been in a recession for some time, is finally under way.
zh: 萧条了好一阵子的日本经济终于开始复苏了。

en: Please hold the line a moment.
zh: 请稍等，别挂断。

en: You'll have to visit me regularly for a while.
zh: 这一阵子你得经常来我这儿看看。

en: Keep an eye on the baby for a while.
zh: 帮我照看一下孩子。

en: You must keep quiet for a while.
zh: 你得安静一会儿。

en: Have you ever got in your car after a long absence and got the brake mixed up with the accelerator?
zh: 你有没有过好久没开车，一上车把刹车和油门搞混了的时候？

en: Keep an eye on the child for me for a moment.
zh: 帮我看一会孩子。

en: I had been reading a magazine for some time when she came.
zh: 她来的时候，我已经看了一会儿杂志了。

en: Give me some time to think it over.
zh: 给我点时间考虑一下。

en: Let me think for a while.
zh: 让我想想。

en: I was wondering if you'd let me stay with you for a few days.
zh: 我在想你能不能让我在这儿住几天。

en: Shall we take a short rest?
zh: 咱们歇会儿吧？

en: I felt better after I took a rest.
zh: 休息了一会儿，我感觉好多了。

en: Keep quiet in bed for a while.
zh: 在床上静静躺会儿。

en: Why don't you have a rest for a while?
zh: 你干嘛不休息会儿？

en: Please remain seated for a few minutes.
zh: 请先坐几分钟。

en: They were both silent for a while.
zh: 他们俩都沉默了一会儿。

en: I don't mind waiting for a while.
zh: 我不介意等一会儿。

en: Nice to see you again.
zh: 很高兴再次见到你。

en: After some hesitation, he laid the book on the desk.
zh: 犹豫了一下，他把书放在了桌子上。

en: After a while, the man came into the room.
zh: 过了一会儿，那个人进屋了。

en: Hold still for a moment, please.
zh: 别动，等一下。

en: After a while, the children settled down.
zh: 过了一会儿，孩子们安静下来了。

en: After a while she began to play the piano again.
zh: 过了一会儿，她又开始弹钢琴了。

en: They began to walk after a while.
zh: 过了一会儿，他们开始走了。

en: After a while he found out the answer.
zh: 过了一会儿，他找到了答案。

en: After a while he came back with a dictionary under his arm.
zh: 过了一会儿，他夹着本字典回来了。

en: It was some time before he realized his mistake.
zh: 过了好久他才意识到自己的错误。

en: He began to talk nonsense after a while.
zh: 过了一会儿，他开始胡言乱语了。

en: After a while, he came.
zh: 过了一会儿，他过来了。

en: After a while, the little black rabbit sat down, and looked very sad.
zh: 过了一会儿，那只小黑兔坐了下来，看起来很难过。

en: After a while, it grew dark.
zh: 过了一会儿，天黑了。

en: They began to walk again after a while.
zh: 过了一会儿，他们又开始走了。

en: After a while, he came to.
zh: 过了一会儿，他醒过来了。

en: Can I ride this horse for a while?
zh: 我能骑一会儿这匹马吗？

en: I think I'll stay put in this town for a while.
zh: 我想我会在这镇上待上一段时间。

en: Hold on for a while, please.
zh: 请等一会儿。

en: Can I ride this horse for a long time?
zh: 这匹马我能骑很久吗？

en: Will you stay here for a while?
zh: 你会在这一直待着吗？

en: Would you mind my staying here for some time?
zh: 你介意我在这儿住一段时间吗？

en: Wait here for a while.
zh: 在这儿等一会儿。

en: The dew has fallen on the lawn.
zh: 草坪上结露水了。

en: More often than not, he had to go in person.
zh: 他经常得亲自去。

en: They communicate with each other often by mail.
zh: 他们经常写信联系。

en: As often as not, we lay awake all night.
zh: 我们经常整晚睡不着。

en: As is often said, it is difficult to adjust yourself to a new environment.
zh: 常言道，适应新环境挺难的。

en: There was a silence.
zh: 一阵沉默。

en: Could I have three cinnamon donuts?
zh: 给我来三个肉桂甜甜圈。

en: I heard you have become Branch Manager of the Sydney office.
zh: 听说你当上悉尼办事处的经理了。

en: Sydney has a beautiful natural harbor.
zh: 悉尼有一个非常漂亮的海港。

en: Sydney is the largest city in Australia.
zh: 悉尼是澳大利亚最大的城市。

en: The air of Sydney is cleaner than that of Tokyo.
zh: 悉尼的空气比东京的干净。

en: I hope to visit Sydney again.
zh: 我希望能再去一次悉尼。

en: To tell the truth, they are not husband and wife.
zh: 说实话，他们不是夫妻。

en: I saw a dog and its tail was cut short.
zh: 我看到一只狗，它的尾巴被剪短了。

en: The Ship Island region was as woody and tenantless as ever.
zh: 希普岛地区还是和以前一样，树木茂密，没人居住。

en: The truth is that he is good by nature.
zh: 其实他本性挺好的。

en: My zipper stuck halfway up.
zh: 我的拉链拉到一半卡住了。

en: Stand still and keep silent.
zh: 站着别动，也别出声。

en: As she watched, the birds, especially Chizuko's golden crane, looked alive in a light autumn breeze.
zh: 她看着那些鸟，特别是千鹤子的那只金纸鹤，在秋风中看着跟真的一样。

en: After patiently listening to the audience's complaints, the judges changed the results.
zh: 评委们耐心地听取了观众的投诉，然后改了结果。

en: Hold still or you'll be shot.
zh: 别动，不然就开枪了。

en: I have a persistent cough.
zh: 我老是在咳嗽。

en: No one stops to listen to him.
zh: 没人停下来听他说话。

en: You have to be patient about your recovery.
zh: 身体康复得慢慢来，别着急。

en: Study hard.
zh: 好好学习。

en: Hold on tight, otherwise you will fall off.
zh: 抓紧了，不然会掉下去的。

en: Go in and win!
zh: 上吧，赢了他们！

en: With a firm goal in mind, you will do well.
zh: 只要目标明确，你一定能行。

en: Pull yourself together, now. There's no point in crying.
zh: 振作点，哭也没用。

en: It matters little what kind of books one reads, so long as one has sound judgement.
zh: 读什么书其实没那么重要，关键是得有自己的判断力。

en: The stew was not half bad.
zh: 这炖菜味道还真不错。

en: What's going on down there?
zh: 下面发生什么事了？

en: Don't excuse what you have done.
zh: 别为你做的事找借口。

en: Therefore, it is necessary to reduce the cost.
zh: 所以，得想办法把成本降下来。

en: For world peace, therefore, we must develop the consciousness that we are all one people of planet Earth through continual international cultural and economic exchange.
zh: 为了世界和平，咱们得通过交流，明白大家都是地球村的人。

en: Hence one can say that, of all political ideals, that of making people happy is the most dangerous.
zh: 所以说，在所有政治理想里，那种想让所有人都幸福的想法其实最危险。

en: Thus you cannot indulge in the pleasure of spending money freely.
zh: 所以你不能在那儿大手大脚地乱花钱。

en: Do whatever you want to do.
zh: 想做什么就做什么。

en: Single people enjoy more freedom to do what they want and enjoy living a less restricted social life.
zh: 单身的人更自由，想干嘛干嘛，社交也没那么多束缚。

en: It is difficult to overcome this shortcoming without drastically changing the whole system.
zh: 要是不彻底改掉这套系统，这个毛病很难改。

en: Changing the system is difficult, not to mention the interpersonal relationships.
zh: 改系统本身就挺难了，更别说那些复杂的人际关系了。

en: This unexpected malfunctioning of the system was caused by improper wiring.
zh: 系统突然出故障是因为线没接对。

en: Please push the Ctrl+Alt+Del key to log on the system.
zh: 请按 Ctrl+Alt+Del 登录系统。

en: There are cases where the system doesn't go.
zh: 有时候这系统就是运行不了。

en: I will not be able to pick up Shigemi at the kindergarten.
zh: 我没法去幼儿园接成美。

en: Could you please pick Shigemi up for me at the day-care center?
zh: 能帮我去托儿所接一下成美吗？

en: He is anxious to go with you.
zh: 他特别想跟你一起去。

en: He soon became confidential with the man.
zh: 他很快就跟那个人熟络起来，什么话都说了。

en: It will not be long before the bridge is built.
zh: 这桥很快就能修好了。

en: It's going to rain soon. Look at those black clouds.
zh: 快下雨了，看那大乌云。

en: It is likely to rain soon.
zh: 看来快要下雨了。

en: We made a date to meet soon.
zh: 我们约好了过两天见一面。

en: Tom soon adapted himself to school life.
zh: 汤姆很快就适应了学校生活。

en: You will recover from your weakness soon.
zh: 你身体很快就能养好的。

en: He took a beautiful shot at a deer.
zh: 他那一枪打得真准，正中那头鹿。

en: And yet the large blocks of stone are fitted together so closely that you cannot put in the point of a knife between them.
zh: 不过，那些大石块凑得可紧了，连个刀尖都插不进去。

en: And among the good there are Serbs and Croats and Muslims, just as there are among the bad.
zh: 好人里有塞尔维亚人、克罗地亚人和穆斯林，坏人里也一样。

en: A frown may express anger or displeasure.
zh: 皱眉头可能代表生气或者不高兴。

en: A baby deer can stand as soon as it's born.
zh: 小鹿一出生就能站起来。

en: Abide by the inevitable.
zh: 没法避免的事，只能顺其自然了。

en: The current low status of the elderly may be changing, however.
zh: 不过，现在老年人地位不高的情况可能正在发生改变。

en: But his eyes were blue and bright.
zh: 但他的眼睛蓝蓝的，特别有神。

en: But the compass isn't in the head of the bee, it's in the body.
zh: 但蜜蜂的“指南针”不在头上，而是在身体里。

en: But as civilizations grew more complex, better methods of communication were needed.
zh: 可是随着文明越来越复杂，人们需要更好的沟通方式。

en: Barter, however, was a very unsatisfactory system because people's needs seldom matched exactly.
zh: 但物物交换这种方式挺不好使的，因为大家的需要很难正好对上。

en: But they never lose their way.
zh: 但他们从来不会迷路。

en: But how can they do this?
zh: 但他们是怎么做到的呢？

en: But, he didn't keep his promise.
zh: 但他没守信用。

en: But he can't enjoy hot summers.
zh: 但他受不了大热天。

en: But he was lucky.
zh: 但他运气挺好的。

en: But he is bad at reading English.
zh: 但他英语阅读挺差的。

en: But he was excited too.
zh: 但他也挺兴奋的。

en: But he doesn't know it yet.
zh: 但他还不知道这事儿呢。

en: But his friends call him Ken.
zh: 但他朋友都管他叫 Ken。

en: But few of them are worth reading.
zh: 但没几本值得看的。

en: But in spite of the merits of being single, they do want to get married some day.
zh: 虽然单身挺好的，但他们早晚还是想结婚。

en: However, the guarantee is not effective at all outside the fixed form.
zh: 不过，出了这张表，这保证就完全没用了。

en: But earthquakes are still as frightening as ever.
zh: 但地震还是那么吓人。

en: But the boy stayed away for a long time.
zh: 但那男孩走了好久都没回来。

en: But no man could help me.
zh: 但谁也帮不了我。

en: But she had not expected to cross an ocean, enter a new and romantic-sounding country, and find herself in exactly the same position.
zh: 但她没想到，穿过大洋来到一个听着挺浪漫的国家，结果处境还是一模一样。

en: But they look very green, don't they?
zh: 但它们看着挺绿的，不是吗？

en: But being bored is also fun in a way.
zh: 但无聊在某种程度上也挺有意思的。

en: But showing off the presents could embarrass the guests who did not bring one.
zh: 但显摆礼物可能会让那些没带礼物的客人挺尴尬的。

en: If the other party does not offer personal information, however, it is better to leave it alone.
zh: 要是对方没主动提个人隐私，最好也别瞎打听。

en: But light does not travel at the same speed through all materials; it goes slower through some than through others.
zh: 但光在不同物质里跑的速度不一样，有些跑得快，有些跑得慢。

en: That, however, tells you just about as much as you would know about water if you were told that it was wet.
zh: 但这就跟有人告诉你水是湿的一样，其实没提供什么有用的信息。

en: But every man had to give five years of service to the government.
zh: 但每个男人都得给政府干满五年。

en: But people have little hope.
zh: 但人们觉得没什么希望。

en: But whoever lives by the truth come into the right.
zh: 但按真理行事的人，总会走上正道。

en: But more often than not, we came back empty-handed.
zh: 但我们经常是白跑一趟。

en: But I slept right through the class. Don't you ever sleep through an eight-thirty class?
zh: 但我整节课都在睡觉。你八点半的课从来不补觉吗？

en: But I wasn't afraid.
zh: 但我一点也不怕。

en: Even today, however, women struggle against discrimination.
zh: 但即便是今天，女性也还是得面对各种歧视。

en: But today smoking in public places is forbidden or strictly restricted.
zh: 但现在公共场合要么禁烟，要么管得特别严。

en: Nowadays, however, calculators can be used freely in school examinations, and already in many schools the only sound to be heard during a math exam is the sound of children tapping on their calculators.
zh: 但现在考试时都能用计算器了，好多学校考数学时，全场只能听到学生在那儿按计算器的声音。

en: But today, a lot of young people are following her example.
zh: 但现在好多年轻人都学起她来了。

en: However, I can't help noticing, at this moment, that at first glance it seems inevitable that the shark will devour the man.
zh: 不过，我不禁注意到，这一眼看上去鲨鱼肯定要把那人给吞了。

en: But now things have changed tremendously.
zh: 但现在情况已经完全不一样了。

en: But you're not there.
zh: 但你人不在那儿啊。

en: But you don't want to bend the knees too much.
zh: 但膝盖可别弯得太厉害。

en: But, to his credit, he didn't say anything against her.
zh: 但他还挺厚道的，一句她的坏话也没说。

en: But we carried on without him.
zh: 但没他我们也照样干下去了。

en: We believe, however, that over a period of time, we will be able to make remittance in full settlement.
zh: 不过我们觉得，过段时间应该就能把账全结清了。

en: However, Lucy is about to leave her home.
zh: 不过，露西这就打算离家出门了。

en: But Pepperberg says working with the parrot has already changed the way of looking at animals.
zh: 但佩珀伯格说，跟鹦鹉一起工作已经改变了他对动物的看法。

en: However, his girlfriend is selfish and hardly worries about Brian.
zh: 但他女朋友挺自私的，一点都不关心布莱恩。

en: One evening, however, when Miss Baker got back to the college a few minutes before the time by which all students had to be in, she found another car in her parking space.
zh: 不过有一回，贝克小姐赶在门禁前几分钟回学校，却发现自己的车位被占了。

en: However, the amount of wind available varies with the location and the season of the year.
zh: 但风力大小得看地方，也得看季节。

en: However, the quantity was not correct.
zh: 但数目不对。

en: His words, however, were not believed at all.
zh: 但根本没人信他说的话。

en: Yet Japan is still not sufficiently understood by other countries, and the Japanese, likewise, find foreigners difficult to understand.
zh: 可别的国家还是不太了解日本，日本人也一样，觉得外国人很难搞懂。

en: What I most noticed about my Japanese high school, however, was the great respect shown by students toward their teachers.
zh: 不过我在日本高中感触最深的是，学生们对老师特别尊敬。

en: However, only the human community has verbal languages as a means of communication.
zh: 但只有咱们人类才有口语这种沟通方式。

en: Real change for most black people, however, was very slow in coming.
zh: 但对大多数黑人来说，真正的改变来得实在是太慢了。
